hero.title: Our Goals
hero.subtitle: Driving sustainable change through concrete action and community engagement

intro: Our values advocate for the eradication of discrimination in work and education.

goals.title: Quality Education
goals.description: Provide equal and affordable opportunities in education, and improve education outcomes.
targets: Provide at least 25% of schools in underdeveloped areas with quality teaching resources
Build 100 new schools in areas without good education
Ensure opportunities for continued study past the age of 18

goals.title: Decent Work
goals.description: Opportunities for everyone to get work that is productive and delivers a fair income, security in the workplace and social protection for families, better prospects for personal development and social integration.
targets: All employers to provide safe working environments for all employees
Work place security and protection for families
Help 3/5 of unemployed people to find and keep a job with a livable wage

goals.title: Gender Equality
goals.description: Ensure Gender Equality is upheld withing work and education.
targets: Lower discrimination based on gender, in the work place and education by at least 75%
Make payed maternity leave a legal right
